cakes.name: Black Forest
cakes.description: A classic German chocolate cake with cherries and whipped cream, perfect for any celebration. The whipped cream adds a light and airy texture making it a irresistible treat for all. A perfect blend of rich chocolate and sweet cherries.

cakes.name: Blue Ice Cream Themed
cakes.description: A fun and playful ice cream themed cake in shades of blue, perfect for a birthday party. The design of the cake is very detailed and realistic making it a center of attraction. Perfect for ice cream lovers.

cakes.name: Galaxy Macaron
cakes.description: An out of this world cake with galaxy inspired macarons and a unique design, perfect for a space themed party. The galaxy effect on the macarons is very realistic and adds a touch of elegance to the cake. Perfectfor those who love unique and creative cakes. The macarons are made with high quality ingredients to ensure a delicious taste.

cakes.name: Jungle Animal Themed
cakes.description: A jungle themed cake with fondant animals and a fun design, perfect for a safari or animal themed party. The fondant animals are very detailed and realistic, adding a touch of fun and playfulness to the cake. Perfect for children's birthday parties.

cakes.name: Over The Rainbow
cakes.description: A colorful and vibrant cake in the shape of a rainbow, perfect for a birthday party. The colors of the rainbow are very vivid and bold, making it a center of attraction. Perfect for those who love bright and bold colors.

cakes.name: Red Velvety Drip
cakes.description: A classic red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting and a velvety drip, perfect for a special occasion. The cream cheese frosting adds a tangy and creamy element to the cake. A perfect balance of flavors.

cakes.name: Strawberries & Cream
cakes.description: A moist vanilla cake with fresh strawberries and whipped cream, perfect for a summer birthday celebration. The strawberry filling and frosting adds a natural sweetness and a touch of freshness to the cake. Perfect for those who love the taste of fresh strawberries.

cakes.name: Superhero Themed
cakes.description: A fun and playful superhero themed cake, perfect for a birthday party. The design is very detailed and realistic, adding a touch of fun and playfulness to the cake. Perfect for children's birthday parties.

cakes.name: Vanilla Vanilla
cakes.description: A classic and simple vanilla cake , perfect for any birthday celebration. The vanilla flavor is rich and authentic, making it a crowd-pleaser. A perfect option for those who prefer a classic and timeless taste.

cakes.name: Banana Bread & Caramel
cakes.description: Our Banana Bread & Caramel is a moist banana bread with a rich caramel glaze. The caramel is made with real butter which gives the bread a rich and delicious flavor. Perfect for breakfast or as a sweet snack. The banana bread is made with ripe bananas, ensuring a strong banana flavor.

cakes.name: Black Forest Gateau
cakes.description: Our Black Forest Gateau is a classic German chocolate cake with cherries and whipped cream. It is a perfect blend of rich chocolate and sweet cherries. The whipped cream adds a light and airy texture making it a irresistible treat for all. The cherries used in the cake are fresh, adding a touch of natural sweetness.

cakes.name: Chocolate Duo
cakes.description: Our Chocolate Duo is a chocolate lover's dream with layers of dark and white chocolate. The dark chocolate adds a rich and intense flavor while the white chocolate gives a sweet and creamy taste. Perfect for all chocolate lovers. The chocolate used in the cake is of high quality, ensuring a rich and indulgent taste.

cakes.name: Lemon Drizzle
cakes.description: Our Lemon Drizzle is a tangy lemon cake with a sweet lemon glaze. The tanginess of the lemon is balanced by the sweetness of the glaze making it perfect for any time of the day. A great option for those who love a citrus flavor. The lemons used in the cake are fresh, ensuring a strong lemon flavor.

cakes.name: Matcha
cakes.description: Our Matcha cake is a green tea flavored sponge cake with a smooth matcha butter cream, perfect for green tea lovers. The matcha powder used in the cake is high quality, ensuring a strong and authentic matcha flavor. Perfect for those who love the taste of green tea

cakes.name: Raspberry
cakes.description: Our Raspberry cake is a moist sponge cake with a raspberry filling and icing. The raspberries used in the cake are fresh, adding a touch of natural sweetness. Perfect for those who love the taste of fresh raspberries.

cakes.name: Red Velvet
cakes.description: Our Red Velvet cake is a classic red velvet cake with cream cheese icing. The cake is moist and fluffy, with a unique and subtle cocoa flavor. Perfect for those who love the classic taste of red velvet cake.

cakes.name: Strawberry
cakes.description: Our Strawberry cake is a moist sponge cake with a strawberry filling and icing. The strawberries used in the cake are fresh, adding a touch of natural sweetness. Perfect for those who love the taste of fresh strawberries.

cakes.name: Victoria Sponge
cakes.description: Our Victoria Sponge cake is a classic sponge cake filled with jam and cream, named after Queen Victoria. The cake is light and fluffy, with a subtle vanilla flavor. Perfect for those who love the classic taste of a traditional Victoria Sponge cake.
